languages.text: Обходя ловушки и засады противника, мы тут же воксировали их координаты наводчикам артиллерии. Пока наши соратники-громовержцы вычищали затаившихся ублюдков, мы дарили милость Императора остальным, медленно, но верно подступая к стенам города.

traits.locale_text: Обходя ловушки и засады противника одну за другой, мы тут же воксировали их координаты наводчикам артиллерии. Пока ребята вычищали затаившихся ублюдков, мы наглядно демонстрировали милость Императора остальным, медленно, но верно подступая к стенам города.

languages.text: Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.
languages.original_text: Обходя ловушки и засады противника, мы тут же воксировали их координаты наводчикам артиллерии. Пока наши соратники-громовержцы вычищали затаившихся ублюдков, мы дарили милость Императора остальным, медленно, но верно подступая к стенам города.

traits.locale_text: Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Grace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Grace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Grace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Grace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

languages.text: 每当我们成功地避开敌人的陷阱与埋伏圈时，我们便会将敌人的坐标通过音阵通讯告知炮手。随后，我们的战友会将雷鸣般的炮火倾泻在那些狗娘养的臭杂种头上，之后轮到我们清扫战场，送所有还没死的异端分子去见神皇。就这样，我们缓慢地朝着城墙稳步推进。
languages.original_text: Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

traits.locale_text: 每当我们成功地避开敌人的陷阱与埋伏圈时，我们便会将敌人的坐标通过音阵通讯告知炮手。随后，我们的战友会将雷鸣般的炮火倾泻在那些狗娘养的臭杂种头上，之后轮到我们清扫战场，送所有还没死的异端分子去见神皇。就这样，我们缓慢地朝着城墙稳步推进。

languages.text: Chaque fois que nous réussissions à éviter un piège ou une embuscade de l'ennemi, nous envoyions ses coordonnées aux artilleurs par transmission-vox. Pendant que nos camarades faisaient tomber la foudre sur la tête de ces fils de chien, nous offrions la Paix de l'Empereur aux autres en avançant lentement, mais sûrement vers les murs de la ville.
languages.original_text: Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que nous réussissions à éviter un piège ou une embuscade de l'ennemi, nous envoyions ses coordonnées aux artilleurs par transmission-vox. Pendant que nos camarades faisaient tomber la foudre sur la tête de ces fils de chien, nous offrions la Paix de l'Empereur aux autres en avançant lentement, mais sûrement vers les murs de la ville.

languages.text: 敵の罠や待ち伏せを避けるたびに、その座標を砲手にヴォクスキャストで伝えた。仲間たちが狡猾な敵どもの頭上に雷と稲妻の雨を降らせている間、皇帝の平穏を残りの者たちに与え、ゆっくりと、しかし着実に城壁に向かって前進した。
languages.original_text: Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

traits.locale_text: 敵の罠や待ち伏せを避けるたびに、その座標を砲手にヴォクスキャストで伝えた。仲間たちが狡猾な敵どもの頭上に雷と稲妻の雨を降らせている間、皇帝の平穏を残りの者たちに与え、ゆっくりと、しかし着実に城壁に向かって前進した。

languages.text: Cada vez que esquivábamos una trampa o emboscada del enemigo, transmitíamos su posición a los artilleros por voco. Nuestros camaradas hacían caer rayos y truenos sobre esos hijos de puta mientras nosotros otorgábamos la Paz del Emperador a los supervivientes, avanzando de forma lenta pero segura hacia los muros de la ciudad.
languages.original_text: Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que esquivábamos una trampa o emboscada del enemigo, transmitíamos su posición a los artilleros por voco. Nuestros camaradas hacían caer rayos y truenos sobre esos hijos de puta mientras nosotros otorgábamos la Paz del Emperador a los supervivientes, avanzando de forma lenta pero segura hacia los muros de la ciudad.

languages.text: Wenn wir wieder einmal eine Falle oder einen Hinterhalt des Feindes gemieden hatten, übertrugen wir dann die Koordinaten per Vox an die Artillerieschützen. Während unsere Kameraden Donner und Blitze auf die Köpfe dieser feigen Hurensöhne herabregnen ließen, schenkten wir dem Rest den Frieden des Imperators und rückten langsam, aber stetig auf die Wände der Stadt zu.
languages.original_text: Whenever we avoided another one of the enemy's traps and ambushes, we would then vox-cast their coordinates to the artillery gunners. While our comrades rained thunder and lightning upon the heads of those skulking whoresons, we gave the Emperor's Peace to the rest, making slow but steady progress toward the city walls.

traits.locale_text: Wenn wir wieder einmal eine Falle oder einen Hinterhalt des Feindes gemieden hatten, übertrugen wir dann die Koordinaten per Vox an die Artillerieschützen. Während unsere Kameraden Donner und Blitze auf die Köpfe dieser feigen Hurensöhne herabregnen ließen, schenkten wir dem Rest den Frieden des Imperators und rückten langsam, aber stetig auf die Wände der Stadt zu.
